function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Literature search on disaster management and Open Government projects","Impact":"Implementation of ineffective disaster management strategies","Mitigation":"Perform a thorough review of selected papers to ensure relevance and effectiveness","Technologies":"Data analytics and AI for literature analysis","People":"Public administrators, disaster management practitioners","Owner":"Researchers and academic institutions"},{"Description":"Exclusion of papers not focused on smart governance models or disaster management models using emerging technologies","Impact":"Limited scope of analysis and potential oversight of valuable information","Mitigation":"Conduct a broader search and review process to identify relevant papers","Technologies":"Machine learning for automated filtering of relevant papers","People":"Research analysts, academics","Owner":"Research institutions and academic organizations"}]}
